item.description:
Hi everyone,
In order to improve our English skills and knowledge about fine liquors, like cognac, I propose we could meet at the Fireplace, 1634 Beacon street (www.fireplacerest.com) on Saturday, Feb 24th at 3:00pm. There will be an educational chat about cognac and several samples to taste, all on a fireside.
Unfortunately, this activity is not super cheap...around 25$, but could be great fun though.
See you there,
Eric

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Cognac as a good pretext to chat
